author: The Irish Times
title: The Irish Times view on Donald Trump and the WHO: an unconscionable move
description: The World Health Organisation is not perfect, but it seems likely that it will come out of this pandemic far better than the US president
content: In time the deference shown by the World Health Organisation (WHO) to Chinas leadership as it desperately sought access to Wuhan early in the coronavirus outbreak, may be seen as excessive. But to say that its reluctance publicly at that time to criticise Bei… [+1803 chars]
